author: Alicia Vrajlal
title: Chilling photos inside Kim Kardashian s Paris robbery Yahoo7 Be - Yahoo7
text:
Share Chilling photos inside Kim Kardashian s Paris robbery Yahoo7 Be - Yahoo7 
Chilling photos of inside the armed robbery of Kim Kardashian, which took place in Paris on October 3, have emerged. Close 16 Arrests Connected to Kim Kardashian Robbery UP NEXT 
French television network TF1 has screened images of the crime scene, which show tape used to bind the 36-year-old reality star's hands, as well as a gag used to silence her. 
A video has also been released, showing the alleged robbers sitting outside a French cafe. Chilling photos have emerged the armed robbery of Kim Kardashian which took place in Paris in October. Source: Getty The Paris bedroom in the No Address Hotel where the robbery took place. Source: TF1 
Back in October, Kim was tied up during the robbery by a gang of masked men dressed in police uniforms, who broke into her luxury apartment in Paris. 
The reality star, who was alone in the apartment at the time, was then gagged and locked in the bathroom at the No Address Hotel. 
Several men have since been charged for the theft of jewellery worth approximately $9.5million ($9million euros). Photos have emerged of tape used to apparently bind the star's hands. Source: TF1 Pictured is a gag believed to have been used to silence the mother-of-two during the ordeal. Source: TF1 
Kim broke her silence about the terrifying moment last month, admitting she feared for her life while the robbers stole millions of dollars worth of jewels. 
In a new trailer for Keeping Up With The Kardashians released by E! , the mother-of-two recalls the ordeal to her two sisters, Kourtney and Khloe. 
"They're going to shoot me in the back. There's no way out," Kim recounts through tears. Back in October, Kim was tied up during the robbery by a gang of masked men who broke into her luxury apartment in Paris. Source: Getty The No Address Hotel in Paris where the ordeal took place on October 3. Source: Getty A gang of masked men dressed in police uniforms, broke into her luxury apartment (pictured) in Paris and Kim was then gagged and locked in the bathroom. Source: Getty 
"It makes me so upset to think about it," she adds. 
RELATED: WATCH: Kim Kardashian posts sweet new video 
Khloe then comforts her big sister, giving her a hug as Kim struggls to regain her composure. Kim recalls her robbery to her sisters in a recently released Keeping Up With The Kardashians preview. Khloe sits beside her. Source: E! Kim recalls the moment she thought she was going to be shot. Source: E!
